website_summaries.verdict: An affordable range of smaller palettes that are great for traveling.
pros: Available in nine different color collections, each with nine eyeshadows
Mix of matte and shimmer shades
Buttery texture that is easy to blend
cons: Some palettes have glitter shades, which are tricky to apply

customer_reviews.title: Not as buildable as I hoped, especially the yellow
customer_reviews.text: I wast most interested in this palette for the yellow and bottom-middle coral. The yellow doesn't have great payoff, and the sparkle/shimmer shades weren't great enough to justify keeping it just for the bottom-middle coral. I got a single yellow from MAC instead and will use the oranges and corals from my bh cosmetics Take Me Back to Brazil palette
customer_reviews.author: SuperProntoPup

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it. This eyeshadow palette is so pigmented.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Omar

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be a gift. But can't give it in. This condition
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Davalos

customer_reviews.title: Great pigment!
customer_reviews.text: This pallete has real staying power and the colors are so vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Cydnee

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: A lot of shadow for the price. Colors are intense and not quite what I wanted. Colors are as shown.
customer_reviews.author: krista bruno

customer_reviews.title: Good base color palette
customer_reviews.text: this is an okay palette. It was not as pigmented or as shimmery as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: The color is really beautiful, but I found a piece broken...
customer_reviews.text: The color is really beautiful, but I found a piece broken...
customer_reviews.author: Amyai

customer_reviews.title: For professional use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to blend ,very good quality of eye shadow,beautiful colors..
customer_reviews.author: Milena

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and I used it to go to the club and did not come off!!!! Wish I took pictures because huda out did themselves
customer_reviews.author: Jck

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know it was small. But that's how the palette is everywhere. The pigment is so good. Looks great on brown skin.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe O.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The colors weren’t that pigmented. The product itself is very small and because it isn’t pigmented you hit pan pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: ashley mckay

customer_reviews.title: I feel pretty, oh so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and intact! I had read that the colors don't build well; I did not find that to be the case. They go on great, and the colors are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was great!
customer_reviews.text: Read some reviews saying that the pallets were received broken or messed up! I took the chances but it was carefully packaged and was perfect for my daughters gift!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Buy it , you ll love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette. The colors are soo pigmented and blends very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bludollz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The items is totally different from the original. Don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Huda Beauty Coral Obsessions
product_meta.description: Collecting a gorgeous selection of eyeshadows across nine shades, the Obsessions Eyeshadow Palette offers colour that smooths effortless over the eyes, creating blendable and highly pigmented texture. Provides a smooth finish.
